branding_favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

paragraph__15.content: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

button_border_radius.label: Corner Radius
button_border_radius.info: Set to -1 to create a fully rounded-theme border

button_hover_border_radius.label: Corner Radius
button_hover_border_radius.info: Set to the default Corner Radius to disable

product_card__image__drop_shadow.label: Add a drop shadow to the image

paragraph__2.content: You can setup custom labels via product metafields using `metafields.accelerate.product_labels` as a list of single line text.

product_card__labels__discount.label: Discount Label type
product_card__labels__discount.info: Shows when a product has a higher compare at price than the price field.

product_card__title__type.label: Title Type
product_card__title__type.info: h1-h6, Set to 7 for body text

paragraph__1.content: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

title_font.label: Title style
title_font.info: h1-h6, Set to 7 for body text

short_text.label: Shorter Text
short_text.info: Change this if you need a shorter text on smaller devices.

display_duration.label: Display duration
display_duration.info: Only applicable if multiple announcements are active.

scheduled.label: Activate Scheduling
scheduled.info: Requires at least a Start or End Date

paragraph__1.content: The section uses the collection image as a default. Alternatively, you can setup the image via metafields. Metafield images take priority over collection images.

collection_image_metafield.label: Metafield key
collection_image_metafield.info: You can setup metafields in your theme settings. Use the 'accelerate' namespace when setting up the Metafield. (I.e. 'accelerate.key')

title_type.label: Typography
title_type.info: h1-h6, Set to 7 for body text

title_type.label: Type
title_type.info: h1-h6, Set to 7 for body text

collection_metafield.label: Metafield key
collection_metafield.info: You can setup metafields in your theme settings. Use the 'accelerate' namespace when setting up the Metafield. (I.e. 'accelerate.key')

custom_liquid.label: Custom Liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

gallery__size.label: Desktop media size
gallery__size.info: Media is automatically optimized for mobile.

image_selector.label: Select variant by image
image_selector.info: Applies to products with up to 12 Variants and needs an image attached to each variant.

paragraph__1.content: The options apply if the `Variant by Image` selector is disabled or products do not meet the requirements.

color_list.label: Color Options
color_list.info: Comma seperated list of colors to match by Product Option

paragraph__1.content: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

paragraph__2.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

custom_liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

heading.label: Heading
heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.

paragraph__1.content: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/page-types#product-rating-block)

products.label: Default Products
products.info: Fallback in case complimentary products are not set up.

paragraph__1.content: To select complementary products, add the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations)

heading_1.info: Leave the heading label blank to hide the icon column.

paragraph__1.content: Only on required Form Types

name.label: Element Name
name.info: This field is used to transfer the data correctly. Using duplicates will make the duplicate fields redundant

name.label: Element Name
name.info: You can add any additional properties. There are some reserved keywords that enable extra functionality. I.e. `tags` adds tags to a customer when used in any of the Customer/newsletter related forms

value.label: Value
value.info: You can use a `comma` to create a list of items.

name.label: Element Name
name.info: This field is used to transfer the data correctly. Using duplicates will make the duplicate fields redundant

name.label: Name
name.info: Set to `body` for the contact form to use it as a block

handle.label: Menu Handle
handle.info: While in the theme editor, hover over the menu items in the Header and the handle will appear. This input needs to match the menu item handle where you want the dropdown to show.

show_caption.label: Show Caption
show_caption.info: Default to `title`. Create a text metafield within the Collection, Product or Blog post named: `theme.megamenu_caption` to override.

paragraph__1.content: You can override up to 4 images by specifying the dropdown menu handle and adding an image

paragraph__1.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

paragraph__2.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

paragraph__1.content: Change excerpts by editing your blog posts. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/blogs/writing-blogs#display-an-excerpt-from-a-blog-post)
Add a description or image by editing your collection. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/products/collections/collection-layout)
